channel.title: Hi, i have two questions
channel.description:
Question one:One of my questions are how do i make ice barrage hit multiple targets in the wild and on NPCs.
Question two:How do i change the EXP rate of my server?
If you can help me, thanks if you can't, its ok :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2008, 07:10:50 pm[/size][hr]Come on people help me please...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2008, 07:50:47 pm[/size][hr]Uhh.... help..

item.title: Hi, i have two questions
item.dc:creator: @sara_pkaz sara pkaz
item.description:
@sara_pkaz wrote:

/** Full magic spell system for process() starts here * */ if (spellHitTimer == 0) { if (castSpell) { castSpell = false; if (isSpellNPC && (spellNpcIndex != -10)) { appendHitToNpc(spellNpcIndex, spellHit, isStillSpell); } else if (!isSpellNPC && (spellPlayerIndex != -1)) { appendHitToPlayer(spellPlayerIndex, spellHit, isStillSpell); } } spellHitTimer = -1; // FIXED: Why call this over and over? -.- // } /** Full magic spell system for process() ends here * */ if (WaveDelay > 0) { WaveDelay -= 1; }

/** Full magic spell system for process() starts here * */ if (spellHitTimer == 0) { if (castSpell) { castSpell = false; if (isSpellNPC && (spellNpcIndex != -1)) { appendHitToNpc(spellNpcIndex, spellHit, isStillSpell); } else if (!isSpellNPC && (spellPlayerIndex != -1)) { appendHitToPlayer(spellPlayerIndex, spellHit, isStillSpell); } } spellHitTimer = -1; // FIXED: Why call this over and over? -.- // } /** Full magic spell system for process() ends here * */ if (WaveDelay > 0) { WaveDelay -= 1; }
The last one is orginal, top one is the one that works - Deltascape source
